title: Rhyce Power and girlfriend Cheyenne O'Leary put on steamy display in NAKED bath video
text:
Rhyce Power has treated his Instagram followers to an X-rated look into his relationship with new girlfriend Cheyenne O'Leary.

The brother of Married At First Sight star Jessika Power put on a steamy display with Cheyenne as they shared footage of themselves naked in the bath.

Taking to Instagram Stories on Saturday evening, the tattooed personal trainer and his new beau left little to the imagination.

Too far? Rhyce Power and Cheyenne O'Leary (pictured) put on a steamy display with Cheyenne as they shared footage of themselves naked in the bath on Sunday

In a series of videos, Rhyce,28, shared a clip of Cheyenne enjoying a platter of fruit in bed, before she stripped off and climbed into the bath.

The blonde bombshell covered her ample bust with one arm as Rhyce took a boomerang video and shared it with his 88,000 followers.

Then, as he joined her in the tub, Rhyce turned the camera around to give Instagram users a more intimate shot.

Risky! The blonde bombshell covered her ample bust with one arm as Rhys took a boomerang video

The pair certainly looked smitten with each other as they cuddled up together under the water.

But as Rhyce panned the camera down Cheyenne's naked body, she struggled to keep herself covered.

'Babe,' she said, laughing, as Rhyce almost exposed her private parts to his followers.

Lovebirds: The pair confirmed their romance last month as they packed on the PDA during a beach date on the Sunshine Coast

Cheyenne shared similar footage of their steamy bathtime to her social media, posting a clip of Rhyce pouring them a glass of red wine in the bath.

The pair confirmed their romance last month as they packed on the PDA during a beach date on the Sunshine Coast.

The loved-up duo were seen frolicking in the water, before they shared a passionate smooch as they waded in the shallows of the shore.

Their tactile display came after Married At First Sight's Tamara Joy addressed rumours of a possible romance with Rhyce, saying the pair were 'just friends'.

'We're just friends' Married At First Sight's Tamara Joy (pictured) denied rumours of a possible romance with Rhyce
description: Rhyce Power has treated his Instagram followers to an X-rated look into his relationship with new girlfriend Cheyenne O'Leary.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
